about.title: AgriFerti Brasil
about.intro: AgriFerti Brasil was born with the purpose of transforming agribusiness into high-value global businesses. We are more than intermediaries: we act as strategic partners, connecting Brazilian producers, cooperatives, industries and trading companies to the main international buyers, always with security, efficiency and credibility.

global.title: Global Presence
global.description: Solid networking and international experience in Brazil's main producing regions

results.title: Focus on Results
results.description: Total commitment to delivering quality, predictability and lasting partnerships

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Since 2020, we have consolidated our reputation for excellence, innovation and reliability

partnership.title: Strategic Partnership
partnership.description: We are more than intermediaries: we act as partners at every stage

beyond.title: Beyond intermediation
beyond.description1: Brazilian agribusiness is recognized worldwide for its productivity and quality. But turning a harvest into results requires more than production: it requires commercial strategy, access to the right markets and mastery of logistical and bureaucratic processes.
beyond.description2: This is where AgriFerti makes a difference. Our team works at all stages of the agricultural chain, offering:

markets.title: Access to global markets
markets.desc: We connect your production to the largest national and international players

negotiation.title: Safe and transparent negotiation
negotiation.desc: We guarantee clear contracts, fair conditions and alignment between supply and demand

risk.title: Risk management
risk.desc: We work with compliance, credit checking and operational feasibility

logistics.title: Efficient logistics
logistics.desc: We handle transport, storage and shipping, ensuring agility and reliability

bureaucracy.title: Simplified bureaucracy
bureaucracy.desc: We assume all documentation necessary for exports and imports

fertilizers.title: Fertilizers: the production base
fertilizers.description: The fertilizer sector is strategic for the competitiveness of Brazilian agribusiness, and AgriFerti stands out as a reliable supplier of high-standard inputs. We represent international manufacturers and offer solutions such as:

commodities.title: Commodities we operate in
commodities.description: Brazil is one of the world's largest commodity exporters, and AgriFerti connects this production to the global market. We work with grains, proteins, inputs and by-products, offering solutions that increase competitiveness and expand business opportunities.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: Deliver quality, predictability and lasting partnerships, strengthening the entire agricultural production chain.

hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: Connecting Brazil to the main global markets with a wide range of agricultural commodities and fertilizers

fertilizersSection.title: Fertilizers and Minerals
fertilizersSection.subtitle: The Base of Production and Development

intro.title: Fertilizers: Boosting Agribusiness
intro.description: The fertilizer sector is one of the pillars of Brazilian agricultural competitiveness. AgriFerti stands out as a reliable supplier of high-performance inputs, representing international manufacturers of excellence and offering solutions that enhance productivity and sustainability in the field.

minerals.title: Metals and Minerals: Resources that Move Economies
minerals.description: In addition to fertilizers, AgriFerti also operates in the supply and export of strategic metals and minerals, contributing to the strengthening of the global industry and international trade.
minerals.mainTitle: Main Metals and Minerals Exported by Brazil

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: Deliver quality, predictability and lasting partnerships, strengthening the entire agricultural and industrial production chain.

strategic.title: Strategic Partnerships
strategic.subtitle: We build solid relationships with world-renowned companies to guarantee the best solutions to our clients

trust.title: Trust and Credibility
trust.description: Our network of partners reflects our commitment to quality and reliability. Each partnership is built on shared values of excellence, sustainability and mutual growth in the global agribusiness market.
